item.title: SAFety From Cloud Native
item.description: SAFe - Agile For Enterprises “The Scaled Agile Framework” is becoming near ubiquitous at the world’s biggest companies. Promising a roadmap to the near-mythical Agile transformation, it’s not hard to see why it’s compelling. It provides structure and standardisation that will help your enterprise compete in the markets of the future. Right?
